## Description {#details}

Global access point for the JIT debugging interface designed for use with a singleton toolbox.

Handles thread-safe registration and deregistration of object files that are in executable memory managed by the client of this class.

Definition at line 91 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/gdbregistrationlistener-cpp">GDBRegistrationListener.cpp</a>.

## Private Member Functions

### deregisterObjectInternal() {#a07a7f51743d4d481fc59a2cce24c9d6f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;GDBRegistrationListener.cpp&#125;::GDBJITRegistrationListener::deregisterObjectInternal (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a214e872d61db2ea8cb023f127cafd0b9">RegisteredObjectBufferMap::iterator</a> I)</>}>
Deregister the debug info for the given object file from the debugger and delete any temporary copies.

This private method does not remove the function from Map so that it can be called while iterating over Map.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/gdbregistrationlistener-cpp/#l00132">132</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/gdbregistrationlistener-cpp">GDBRegistrationListener.cpp</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Attributes

### JITDebugLock {#a880da7403e190a8d68234ffd1ba19825}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>sys::Mutex anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;GDBRegistrationListener.cpp&#125;::GDBJITRegistrationListener::JITDebugLock</>}>
Lock used to serialize all jit registration events, since they modify global variables.

Only a single instance of <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gdbregistrationlistener-cpp-/gdbjitregistrationlistener">GDBJITRegistrationListener</a> is ever created, and so the lock can be a member variable of that instance. This ensures destructors are run in the correct order.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/gdbregistrationlistener-cpp/#l00098">98</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/gdbregistrationlistener-cpp">GDBRegistrationListener.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
